summary: I'm an Electronic Engineer with experience in both commercial and academic sectors. I'm passionate about supporting my clients with their digital transformation initiatives to achieve their sustainability and digitization target and ambition. I enjoy coordinating between different business units and stakeholders to ensure the best possible outcome of projects for the customers. I love travelling and meeting people of different goes of life.  I've travelled 50+ countries and lived in 7 countries.

treasury_media.title: Win takes team to Vietnam - Education | The Star Online
treasury_media.description: UNIVERSITI Kebangsaan Malaysia's team H20 is all set to represent the country in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, next month after winning the annual university challenge organised by Schneider Electric. Themed "Go Green in the City", the contest challenges students to present innovative ideas for intelligent energy management solutions for cities.

projects.title: Horizon 2020
projects.description: Horizon 2020 is the biggest EU Research and Innovation programme ever with nearly €80 billion of funding available over 7 years (2014 to 2020) – in addition to the private investment that this money will attract. It promises more breakthroughs, discoveries and world-firsts by taking great ideas from the lab to the market.

projects.title: NextBase
projects.description: The energy transition from traditional fossil energies to renewable energies is one of the greatest societal challenges of the present generation. Among the different types of renewable energies, photovoltaics (PV) is considered as one of the most stable and matured technologies. The mainstream of the current PV technology is based on crystalline silicon (c-Si) solar cells. The research and development in this field is mainly driven by the improvement of the energy conversion efficiency and the reduction of module production cost.

profile_positions.description: Leading Schneider Electric's Global Digital Workplace business solutions aiming to help companies in their real estate portfolio management, employee engagement and digital transformation initiatives to achieve their sustainability and digitization ambitions.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Software Solution Leader

profile_positions.description:
•	Combined Schneider Electric’s knowledge and expertise with the strengths of business partners to co-create solutions that are designed to enhance the lives of communities around the globe.
•	Built new relationships with relevant industry contacts and influencers.
profile_positions.title: Specifier Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Designed and fabricated deterministic novel light-trapping nano-structures which optically outperformed popular Lambertian scatterers and periodic inverted pyramids by gaining 1.8% and 2% in short circuit current density (Jsc) respectively.
•	Systematically developed cost-effective, up scalable lithography and etch processes by controlling experimental specifications to improve the optical properties of thin silicon heterojunction solar cells. 
•	Introduced a novel spatially resolved Photoluminescence characterization concept.
•	Led collaboration projects with cross-functional (experimental and numerical simulation) research teams of Forschungszentrum Jülich, Helmholtz Zentrum Berlin, TU Delft, Australian National University and RWTH Aachen University.
•	Provided scientific support by utilizing pragmatic attitude in verifying the output of theoretical models with strong analysis of experimental results for NextBase, Helmholtz Energy Material Foundry (HEMF) and Horizon2020 European projects.
•	Delivered successful cleanroom trainings to 1bachelor, 2 masters, 4 doctoral and 1 post-doctoral fellow.
profile_positions.title: Doctoral Fellow

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed CZTS Solar Cell fabrication process using a single target sputtering technique.
•	Achieved "Excellence Award" in Masters Thesis.
•	Brought funding opportunities by marketing our own product "SolarClean Water Filter".
•	Won different competitions by giving presentations internationally to market the idea of our solution "WaterMight".
•	Co-ordinated CZTS group of Solar Energy Research Institute (SERI).
•	Assisted in the development & preparation of continuing funding opportunities. 
•	Contributed to team decisions about research directions. 
•	Ensured the validity and reliability of data at all times.
•	Maintained clean room supervisor position which involved contacting vendors for maintenance issues and discussion about quotation.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant ; Solar Energy Research Institute (SERI)

profile_positions.description:
Key Accomplishment
•	Generated a revenue of Singaporean $ 1652K (equivalent to € 1059K) in 6 months by selling 472 sets of highly sophisticated vacuum cleaners.
•       Generated qualified sales leads and appointments for the business including, but not exclusively: New business Support Contracts.
•	Followed up marketing campaigns to identify new leads.
•	Monitored and tracked leads sent to sales people
•	Followed up campaigns such as mailings and events in order to generate leads.
•	Allocated leads to salespeople in a timely manner and ensured follow up.
•	Ensured ongoing maintenance of leads generated through daily/weekly contact with salespeople.
profile_positions.title: Inside Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Achieved the Level 3 NVQ Certificate in Sales which is aimed at the learner who is progressing in their career and has significant knowledge and experience. At this level they are required to demonstrate greater autonomy in completing tasks, organising activities and contributing to decision making. Learners who achieve this qualification are able to progress on to the Level 3 NVQ Diploma in Sales or on to higher level qualifications.

•	100% New Business Development.
•	Gaining a place on the programme through a rigorous selection process.
•	Averaging 48 hours per week of in field sales time, regularly exceeding 55 hours a week when including training time.
•	Entirely sales performance driven, heavy focus on personal sales statistics analysis, and skill development towards hitting KPI’s
•	Won various accolades including a place on the company holiday to Tenerife. 
•	Won a recognition prize for consistently high sales – “The Gold Award” and achieved second position in the whole company.
•	In 9 weeks raised a projected figure of £11,340 for charity.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Intern in Sales
